name: Common Resource Grep - crgrep
short_description:
CRGREP is a COMMON  RESOURCE GREP command line tool to search for regular expression matches in difficult to access resource data.

Match name and content text in database tables, plain files, MS Office documents, PDF, archive files such as ZIP, image meta-data, text in scanned documents, maven dependencies and web resources.

CRGREP will drill down into arbitrary combinations of  resources to any depth, an example could be text within files within archives which are resolved via maven pom.xml dependencies.

Here you will find binary downloads. The actual development, any issue tracking, and discussion occurs here: https://bitbucket.org/cryanfuse/crgrep
